mapper.select: SELECT unit from db_vibe_basic.t_code where id = #{catalog} and catalog in (2001, 2200) limit 1

SELECT t.moment, TRUNCATE(SUM(amountValue),2) AS inc FROM ${srcTable} AS t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON s.id = p.parent WHERE pe.itemize_type = #{catalog} and pe.value_type=1 AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY t.moment ORDER BY t.moment

SELECT t.moment, TRUNCATE(SUM(amountValue) / IFNULL(s.area, 1),2) AS inc FROM ${srcTable} AS t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON s.id = p.parent WHERE pe.value_type=1 and pe.itemize_type = #{catalog} AND p.parent = #{spaceId} AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY t.moment ORDER BY t.moment

SELECT s.caption AS spaceCaption, TRUNCATE(SUM(amountValue),2) AS inc FROM ${srcTable} AS t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON s.id = p.parent WHERE pe.value_type=1 and pe.itemize_type = #{catalog} AND s.parent = #{spaceId} AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY s.seqence
select id, catalog as catalogId, name, unit, parent as parentId from db_vibe_basic.t_code where catalog = 2200 order by parent

SELECT t.moment, TRUNCATE(SUM(amountValue),2) AS inc FROM db_vibe_data.t_sample_float_hour t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON s.id = p.parent WHERE pe.value_type=1 and s.parent = 0 AND pe.itemize_type = 34 AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY t.moment ORDER BY t.moment

SELECT s.id as spaceId, s.type as spaceType, s.name as spaceName, s.caption as spaceCaption, p.type as probeType, p.name as probeName, p.caption as probeCaption, c.unit as probeUnit, t.moment as moment, TRUNCATE(SUM(amountValue),2) AS inc FROM ${srcTable} AS t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_space s ON s.id = p.parent LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code c ON c.catalog = 2200 AND c.id = pe.itemize_type WHERE pe.value_type=1 and pe.itemize_type = #{catalog} AND s.parent = #{spaceId} AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY p.parent, t.moment ORDER BY p.parent, t.moment

SELECT pe.itemize_type AS catalog, c.name, t.moment, TRUNCATE((amountValue),2) AS inc, c.unit FROM ${srcTable} AS t LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe p ON p.id = t.monitor LEFT JOIN db_vibe_monitor.t_probe_energy pe ON pe.probe_id = p.id LEFT JOIN db_vibe_basic.t_code c ON c.id = pe.itemize_type WHERE pe.value_type=1 and c.catalog = 2200 AND c.parent = #{catalog} and p.parent = 1 and c.name <> '综合用电' AND t.moment BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY pe.itemize_type, t.moment ORDER BY pe.itemize_type, t.moment
